markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced Domain](/Feats.aspx?ID=285) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 123 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Soul Warden](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=173) (Level 16)

**Prerequisites**
[Domain Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=265)

</column>

---

Your studies or prayers have unlocked deeper secrets of your deity’s [domain](/domains). You gain an advanced domain spell from one of your domains. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

**Special** You can select this feat multiple times. Each time, you must select a different advanced domain spell from a domain for which you have an initial domain spell.

<title level="2">Advanced Domain leads to...</title>
[Deity's Protection](/Feats.aspx?ID=298)
name: Advanced Domain
